name: Up
description:
Minimal platformer game where you have to navigate a falling tower of platforms. Control the tower and collect powerups to navigate your way to a highscore!

Signup inside the game is just a simple username/password combo (passwords are encrypted too!) that are used to track people's highscores - no email addresses or any funny business. 

More features being added all the time; free to play, donations welcome but not even remotely required. If you want the game for free just click the "No thanks, take me to the downloads" link after clicking the "Download Now" button below.

Currently In Development - Feedback appreciated; please let me know if you have any trouble running / playing the game!
